reviews.review: what else is there to say other than it's the conclusion to 10 years of filmmaking and that it exceeds all of my expectations
Awesome! Can't wait for the sequel. Loved how it left on a downer vintage Empire. But I'm excited for the comeback of the heroes we all love!

Don't believe the hype.  This is a cameo fest with no plot, no suspense, and generic action scenes.  Aside from a couple humerous moments, this movie is a snoozer.  I think I'm done with Avengers; too many heroes just means no plot or character development.  I'll wait for the single hero movies like Black Panther and Spiderman: Homecoming instead.

A great movie for all to see, including those who aren't usually fans of superhero movies.

A great cast of actors and characters with a deeply engaging and thought-provoking story that had great writing contributes to the success of this movie.

Non stop action and plot without getting totally cheesy or too violent. Excellent movie. Highly recommend
Awesome movie. Was non stop action the entire time.

Enjoyed the cast and story. More than I thought I would. spoiler alert: Absolutely hated the fact that it's a cliffhanger I have to wait for the next film to see what's going to happen. I know that's the way of the world in movie sagas, but I hated it the end of Return of the Jedi back in the 70s, and I hate it now! absolutely gut-wrenching ending for me.
Too bad we have to wait a year to find out what happens!

2.5 hrs of Avengers getting their a$$'s beat. +15 mins of credits to find out about a movie we already know is coming. I understand this isnt the end of the journey, but most films have some sort of hope, or some sense of a small victory between them, there isn't at all with Infinity War. Save the $12, not worth it in the end.

The 2.5 stars I give this film are entirely for actors / and the visuals of it all. Zero for the writing of this film. The only plot here is various avengers getting beat on various plants. The End.
Boo on Marvel!  Plot line was okay, EXCEPT, instead of any kind of resolution (which any movie worth its salt should have), we get ONLY a cliffhanger to the next movie.  CHEAP!!
